a0.speaker: Youmu:
a0.dialogue: Purple mist? More like, is this another way to end your life?

a1.speaker: Ayaka:
a1.dialogue: Most would think jumping in the poisonous water means your ultimate end.

a2.speaker: Ayaka:
a2.dialogue: But once you discard your earthly body behind or even have it fade away to oblivion soon thereafter...

a3.speaker: Ayaka:
a3.dialogue: You won't feel pain or sadness anymore.

a4.speaker: Ayaka:
a4.dialogue: Right before your eyes will be the presence of the holy, omnibenevolent Reverence.

a5.speaker: Youmu:
a5.dialogue: Mistress Yuyuko did that when she converted to a youkai-born, but in the end, it seems like she got nothing.

a6.speaker: Ayaka:
a6.dialogue: That is because she doesn't have any faith in Reverence. As her old self crumbled into ashes, so did her old spirit.

a7.speaker: Ayaka:
a7.dialogue: If she believes in the saving grace of Reverence, she would have been living forever in the Kingdom of God.

a8.speaker: Youmu:
a8.dialogue: I have no idea who on Earth is the 'Reverence' you are babbling about.

a9.speaker: Youmu:
a9.dialogue: And that certain 'Reverence' having a whole Kingdom?

a10.speaker: Youmu:
a10.dialogue: She must be the type of person who can easily put Yuyuko to shame.

a11.speaker: Youmu:
a11.dialogue: But if we gonna have to bite the dust in order to get there... I won't take any chances.

a12.speaker: Youmu:
a12.dialogue: If I ever get there, I will just stay shut about this place in order to not hurt Mistress Yuyuko's feelings.

a13.speaker: Youmu:
a13.dialogue: Imagine 'Reverence' getting off a fancy carriage and people like you start playing something unfunny on piano.

a14.speaker: Ayaka:
a14.dialogue: This is an act of irreverence towards Reverence.

a15.speaker: Ayaka:
a15.dialogue: Even though Reverence's benevolence encompasses all when things are going out of hand...

a16.speaker: Ayaka:
a16.dialogue: The Reverence will unleash Her wrath upon them.

a17.speaker: Ayaka:
a17.dialogue: This girl has transgressed the Eternal Divinity of Reverence, and I can feel it. Her wrath is going straight down on her.

a18.speaker: Ayaka:
a18.dialogue: Now, be prepared to suffer your demise and join Uzzah in everlasting torture!
